title: Rakan, Evelynn, and Ahri Valentines Day Cards I Made!
body:
[Here's Rakan,](https://dartty.deviantart.com/art/Rakan-Valentines-Day-Card-723320705)
https://78.media.tumblr.com/9df5fe514066317ef5aa0b5426fa0c64/tumblr_p1wohbc72Z1r2ry9do3_1280.png

[Ahri, ](https://dartty.deviantart.com/art/Ahri-Valentines-Day-Card-723322027)
https://78.media.tumblr.com/7af6c87712fc694cda4e1433b13f86f9/tumblr_p1wohbc72Z1r2ry9do1_1280.png

[and Evelynn. 
](https://dartty.deviantart.com/art/Evelynn-Valentines-Day-Card-723321638)
https://78.media.tumblr.com/4901fff03363b39cdfa53feb0b2d1363/tumblr_p1wohbc72Z1r2ry9do2_1280.png

I know these are a month early technically but I was so motivated I couldn't help but just draw them now! I will be posting the ones with no words at a later date. What do you guys think of them? I think Rakan, Ahri, and Evelynn are the only three in the game with a charm? I could be wrong though.

replies.body:
I laughed out loud at the You're no Xayah
These are so awesome!! Thank you for sharing them with us :D!!
... your job title is Star Guardian... very nice.{{sticker:sg-lulu}}
It's tough work but someone's gotta do it {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
What actualy do a Riot Star Guardian ?

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Ve1vet,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=iElW6NMb,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2018-01-03T22:16:41.116+0000)
>
> I laughed out loud at the You're no Xayah
> These are so awesome!! Thank you for sharing them with us :D!!

Ahh thank you!! Ahh I don’t remember if I replied to your comment so I will now and be really late about it. I’m glad you liked the rakan one he was the one I was more proud of
Ahh thank you so much! I'm glad you liked that one, I was most proud of Rakan's lol
I just seen that on reddit, was that you?
Yes! I posted this on Reddit first before posting it here.

> [{quoted}](name=Kyoho,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=iElW6NMb,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2018-01-02T08:16:42.369+0000)
>
> Yes! I posted this on Reddit first before posting it here.

Oh well my comment didn't go through for some reason so i'll say it here.
"Why couldn't these have existed when I was in grade school?? I would've gotten all the girls!"
Extremely good job homie
Ahhhhh youre so sweet lol, man I wish i could draw as a kid so i could have just made my own. thank you so much {{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}}

> [{quoted}](name=Kyoho,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=iElW6NMb,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2018-01-02T08:28:38.496+0000)
>
> Ahhhhh youre so sweet lol, man I wish i could draw as a kid so i could have just made my own. thank you so much {{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}}

You're very welcome. My drawings look exactly how they did when I was in kindergarten, like Napoleon Dynamite's drawings lol.
I just spend waaaaaaaaaaay too much drawing lol

> [{quoted}](name=Kyoho,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=iElW6NMb,comment-id=000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2018-01-02T09:17:45.759+0000)
>
> I just spend waaaaaaaaaaay too much drawing lol

That's a good hobby though!
